Class Round

extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • numOfTricks

        public int numOfTricks()
        Calculate the number of tricks being played in the current round to decide number of cards to deal
        Returns:
        numOfTricks

      • callPlayersPlayTrick

        public java.util.Map<java.util.Map<Player,​java.lang.Integer>,​java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>>> callPlayersPlayTrick()
        Creates and runs an instance of a trick. Allows players to bid before the start of the trick if the trick created is the first trick of the round. Runs the trick, and at the end of each trick, track the winner in a hashmap Bids and tricks won are then stored in a hashmap
        Returns:
        output hashmap of players' bids and number of tricks won respectively

      • createBidsAllowedList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> createBidsAllowedList​(int unallowedBidAmount)
        Creates a list of integers that contains the number of bids that the players are allowed to place.
        Parameters:
        unallowedBidAmount - bid amount that players are not allowed to bid as this would cause total number of bids to be above total number of tricks or equals to the number of tricks
        Returns:
        bidsAllowedList

      • placeBids

        public java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>> placeBids​(java.util.List<Player> playOrder,
                                                                                         Trick trick)
        Calls players' functions to place bid at the start of the round.
        Parameters:
        playOrder - list of players in the order that they are bidding, starting from left of the dealer
        trick - the instance of the trick being played
        Returns:
        bidsPlaced a list constaining a hasmap of the player and their respective bid for the round

      • getTrumpSuit

        public project.model.Suit getTrumpSuit()
        Returns:
        trumpsuit trump suit of the round
